title: (Pwn2Own) HP LaserJet Pro MFP 3301fdw suidexec Command Injection Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of HP LaserJet Pro MFP 3301fdw printers. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the suidexec executable. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied string before using it to execute a system call. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of root.
addtionnal_details: HP has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://support.hp.com/us-en/document/ish_11953771-11953793-16/hpsbpi04007
timeline:
2025-02-24 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-03-03 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-03-03 - Advisory Updated
credit: Felipe Jacob Custodio Romero, Neodyme AG
